name: A cloak of tongues
data: It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has low armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'tonal control'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'vocal training'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'tonal projection'.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
